captions.text:
YEP.
HE IS GONE.

OKAY MAKE A NOTE IN THE FUTURE WE WILL NO
LONGER

THROW SURPRISE PARTIES FOR PEOPLE WITH HEART
PROBLEMS.

GUYS, I TOLD YOU THIS WAS A BAD IDEA.
JEREMY DOESN’T FEEL EMOTIONS LIKE NORMAL

PEOPLE.
THE SHOCK WAS JUST TOO MUCH.

THIS IS HORRIBLE.
MY HANDS ARE STILL SHAKING.

WHAT DO WE DO?
WE BURY HIM.

I’LL GET A SHOVEL.
WHOA, WHOA, WHOA.

GUYS, HOLD ON.
LOOK, WE’VE JUST BEEN THROUGH A TERRIBLE

EXPERIENCE AND
WE’RE NOT THINKING CLEARLY.

I THINK EVERYONE JUST NEEDS TO JUST SIT ON
THE COUCH,

TRY TO RELAX, I’LL MAKE SOME PHONE CALLS.
[DOORBELL] [GASPS]

DON’T WORRY, GO SEE.
IT’S A COP.

HE’S GOING TO THINK WE KILLED JEREMY.
WHAT DO WE DO?

WE CAN’T LET HIM TAKE US.
WHOA, WHOA, GUYS, CALM DOWN.

THIS WAS A TRAGIC ACCIDENT, THAT’S ALL.
WE HAVE NOTHING TO HIDE HERE.

I’M SORRY MATT.
I DON’T KNOW WHY WE FREAKED OUT.

I DON’T EVEN KNOW WHY I’M HOLDING THIS
THING.

[CRIES ALOUD] OOPS.
[DOORBELL] IT’S TOTALLY GOING TO LOOK

LIKE WE STABBED JEREMY NOW!
WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO?

WE CAN’T LET HIM TAKE US.
WHOA!

GUYS, YES, THIS LOOKS SUSPICIOUS,
BUT WE WILL ONLY MAKE THINGS WORSE IF WE TRY

TO COVER IT UP.
BEST TO JUST CALMLY EXPLAIN WHAT HAPPENED.

OKAY, YOU’RE RIGHT AGAIN MATT.
SORRY.

MAN I DON’T EVEN KNOW WHY I’M HOLDING
THIS THING.

[GUNSHOT] [SCREAMS]
HE’S NEVER GOING TO BELIEVE US NOW!

WHAT DO WE DO?
WE CAN’T LET HIM TAKE US.

THE POISON FROM THESE DARTS CAN TAKE A MAN
OUT IN TWO SECONDS.

WHAT?
IT’S FOR WHEN I GO JOGGING AT NIGHT.

NO STOP!
STOP!

THERE IS NO NEED TO PANIC!
I’M SORRY.

I’M SORRY!
OKAY, IT’S JUST THE LAST TWO MINUTES HAVE

BEEN REALLY STRESSFUL.
BUT I THINK YOU’RE RIGHT.

I JUST- [SNEEZE]
[GASPS AND SCREAMS] WE CAN’T STOP FRAMING

OURSELVES FOR JEREMY’S MURDER!
HE WASN’T MURDERED!

MAYBE HE WAS DON’T KNOW!
I CAN’T KEEP TRACK OF THE DETAILS!

WE’RE FUGITIVES NOW, WE HAVE TO DEFEND OURSELVES.
NO GUYS!

STOP!
STOP!

STOP!
[KNOCK ON THE DOOR] [SCREAMING]

GET ON THE GROUND.
PUT YOUR HANDS ON YOUR HEAD.

YOU PEOPLE MAKE ME SICK.
THIS IS OFFICER HARKEY REQUESTING BACK UP

AT 772--
[GUN SHOT] [DOORBELL]

UM...YOU KNOW WHAT?
ON A SECOND THOUGHT CANCEL THAT REQUEST,

WE DO NOT NEED BACK UP.
CANCEL THAT REQUEST.
UH- SO ANY OF YOU GUYS GOT A SHOVEL?

comments.text:
Actually, the cops would have been able to tell the knife wound was 
postmortem. The gunshot, I'm not so sure of, but the poison wouldn't have 
circulated into his system (given the fact his heart has already stopped 
pumping blood), so it probably wouldn't show up on a tox screen. Even after 
all that, I'm sure it could have been resolved (although, everyone but Matt 
might be arrested for "desecration of a dead human body").﻿
